languages.text: "Наверное... наверное ты прав{mf||а}. Я должна была наказать еретичку — и наказала!"

traits.locale_text: "Наверное... наверное ты прав{mf||а}. Я должна была наказать еретичку — и наказала!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I suppose... I suppose you are right. I had to punish the heretic — and punish her I did!"
languages.original_text: "Наверное... наверное ты прав{mf||а}. Я должна была наказать еретичку — и наказала!"

traits.locale_text: "I suppose... I suppose you are right. I had to punish the heretic — and punish her I did!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I suppose... I suppose you are right. I had to punish the heretic — and punish her I did!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I suppose... I suppose you are right. I had to punish the heretic—and punish her I did!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I suppose... I suppose you are right. I had to punish the heretic—and punish her I did!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I suppose... I suppose you are right. I had to punish the heretic — and punish her I did!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I suppose... I suppose you are right. I had to punish the heretic — and punish her I did!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「そうね…あなたの言う通りだわ。私は異端者を罰さなければならなかった…だから彼女を殺したのよ！」
languages.original_text: "I suppose... I suppose you are right. I had to punish the heretic — and punish her I did!"

traits.locale_text: 「そうね…あなたの言う通りだわ。私は異端者を罰さなければならなかった…だから彼女を殺したのよ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我猜……我猜你说得没错。我必须惩罚那个异端分子，我也确实惩罚了她！”
languages.original_text: "I suppose... I suppose you are right. I had to punish the heretic — and punish her I did!"

traits.locale_text: “我猜……我猜你说得没错。我必须惩罚那个异端分子，我也确实惩罚了她！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Supongo... Supongo que tiene razón. ¡Tenía que castigar a la hereje y lo hice!».
languages.original_text: "I suppose... I suppose you are right. I had to punish the heretic — and punish her I did!"

traits.locale_text: «Supongo... Supongo que tiene razón. ¡Tenía que castigar a la hereje y lo hice!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht ... Vielleicht habt Ihr recht. Ich muss die Ketzerin bestrafen. Und ich habe sie bestraft!"
languages.original_text: "I suppose... I suppose you are right. I had to punish the heretic — and punish her I did!"

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht ... Vielleicht habt Ihr recht. Ich muss die Ketzerin bestrafen. Und ich habe sie bestraft!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « J'imagine... j'imagine que vous avez raison. Je dois punir les hérétiques... et je l'ai punie ! »
languages.original_text: "I suppose... I suppose you are right. I had to punish the heretic — and punish her I did!"

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine... j'imagine que vous avez raison. Je dois punir les hérétiques... et je l'ai punie ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Galiba... Galiba haklısın. Kâfirin cezasını kesmem gerekti, ben de kestim!"
languages.original_text: "I suppose... I suppose you are right. I had to punish the heretic — and punish her I did!"

traits.locale_text: "Galiba... Galiba haklısınız. Kâfirin cezasını kesmem gerekti, ben de kestim!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
